mapper.select: SELECT challenger.*, `user`.nick_name, file.src headSrc FROM challenger INNER JOIN `user` ON challenger.user_id = `user`.id LEFT JOIN upload_file file ON file.id = `user`.head WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, NOW(), challenger.start_time) <= 15 AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, NOW(), challenger.end_time) >= 0
